alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 01 at 3:50AM EDT until May 01 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey and southeast New York, including the following counties, in northeast New Jersey, Bergen. In southeast New York, Rockland. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 350 AM EDT, Little to no additional rainfall is expected over the next several hours, but urban and small stream flooding is expected to continue. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bergenfield, Paramus, Ridgewood, Ramsey, Suffern, Oradell, Fair Lawn, Dumont, Wyckoff, New Milford, Glen Rock, River Edge, Westwood, Hillsdale, River Vale, Waldwick, Washington Township, Park Ridge, Airmont and Upper Saddle River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
